level.text: The Agency may offer a game enhancement to the Hot Lotto Game that shall be known as Sizzler. Nothing in sections 945 and 946 shall be construed to repeal, amend or modify any provisions of this title concerning Hot Lotto except as provided herein.

A Hot Lotto Sizzler that wins one of the 8 regular set prizes, as set forth in Section 946 of this title shall be multiplied by 3. The Hot Lotto Grand Prize shall not be a set prize and shall not be multiplied.
A Hot Lotto player must complete the following steps to add Sizzler to a wager:
Complete a Hot Lotto bet slip marking the Sizzler box on the bet slip; and
Pay the total amount wagered for the Hot Lotto and Sizzler wager.
A Sizzler wager is an additional $1.00 for every dollar wagered for Hot Lotto.

The Executive Director may change the Sizzler multiplier number for special promotions, for a specified period of time and made available to agents and the public in game instructions issued pursuant to Chapter 7 and 8 of this Title.
